channel.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
channel.description:
Okay, so yeah, i have the one and only Dodge Neon. Definitely not the SRT either. Someone tell me if it would be publicly humiliating if i put a body kit on it to make it somewhat more appealing. Good idea, Bad idea? It's electric blue so you can only imagine how much it sticks out already.
See, this looks decent: [img]http://memimage.cardomain.com/ride_images/2/3266/2021/20663510034_large.jpg[/img] But logically I'm not going to put that much effort into it. And it's not that new, it's a 98.

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

To be honest I find that modded Neon to look muuuuuuuch better than the stock Neon. I mean, You don’t have to go crazy with modding it, but atleast make it look better than stock. Anything can improve it the look of it.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:19, topic:283639”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=374851.msg2828713#msg2828713 date=1245228000]

I think this car would not look too bad if you swapped that black bonnet with an electric blue one instead so that it fits in. The black bonnet is what makes me dislike the car.

Does ‘bonnet’ mean ‘hood’? (the body panel in the front between the fenders that covers the engine?)

we call ‘fenders’ quarter panels
[/quote]

We call the panels on either side of the trunk area (the back of the vehicle behind the rear wheels) quarter panels, so what do you call those?[/quote]

Considering Quarter mean 1/4, and there’s four panels. That pretty much means they’re all quarter panels.

Read full topic
item.source: Help, I have a Dodge Neon

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

Rather a 1000 hayabusa engine just on the grounds it’s light.

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:31, topic:283639”]I’d drive one of those smart cars - have you seen what they do with a hayabusa lump in them? Fuckin crazy shit (light)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xLVQtK04lig&feature=related[/quote]

At a local car show I saw a chevrolet chevette:

(also very light) with a Chevy Big Block 502ci engine crammed into it, I bet it’s crazy to drive too.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

mhm indeed, i might have to save up i found one of the engines in the description on ebay, im gonna try and find a banged up smart car and get it fixed so it will be cheap as chips

still, id have one if i had spare cash to fun around, very very fun looking toy

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:28, topic:283639”]So if you could you would buy it?

I don’t know about you guys, but I want my car to look good.[/quote]

If I have a big number on my bank account, I’d get rid of a car like that. But as long as I don’t, I’d go with any car that is cheap to buy, comfortable and cheap to drive.

Read full topic
item.source: Help, I have a Dodge Neon

the only purpose of a good looking car is to attract women. after that it doesnt matter

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:27, topic:283639”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=374851.msg2847885#msg2847885 date=1246383722]

Use the money for something else. Why the hell would anyone spend money to ‘pimp’ their ride. You are on the INSIDE, you can’t see it!

Does that mean you would drive this “car”?


[/quote]

It’s quite small inside, so it doesn’t live up to my requirements. I doubt I can fit into it.[/quote]

So if you could you would buy it?

I don’t know about you guys, but I want my car to look good.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

Lol, alright yeah. I decided to not do anything to it, and really don’t have any plans for it in the future. But just the other day I was skating in town and heard release valves only to turn and see it was a dodge neon SRT 4. It was almost as if it was rubbing it in my face that i didn’t have the srt, let alone with all that shit on it. Mind, this happened a few days after i made this post.

Read full topic
item.source: Help, I have a Dodge Neon

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

If you put a body kit on it, I’ll be making sure it goes on my all show no go topic haha.

Read full topic
item.source: Help, I have a Dodge Neon

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

Bro, keep it the way it is. Putting a body kit on it is a little… showy
Just if you do, pray like hell no one asks you to race. That 140 horsepower isn’t gonna get you anywhere son!

Read full topic
item.source: Help, I have a Dodge Neon

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:17, topic:283639”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=374851.msg2825998#msg2825998 date=1244994810]

Someone tell me if it would be publicly humiliating if i put a body kit on it to make it somewhat more appealing.

Yes, completely humiliating. When I see cars like that drive by I always make fun of them. It would be better for you to just keep that car as a daily driver, and then save up your money to get a nice car you can show off. That’s my 2 cents.
[/quote]

You sit in your clapped out pickup with your cheesey grin laughing? What.[/quote]

He’ll probably be laughing because his “clapped out” pickup could probably embarrass the riced out car.

Read full topic
item.source: Help, I have a Dodge Neon

item.title: Help, I have a Dodge Neon
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:283639”][quote author=Man UTD Freak link=topic=374851.msg2827605#msg2827605 date=1245136101]
I think this car would not look too bad if you swapped that black bonnet with an electric blue one instead so that it fits in. The black bonnet is what makes me dislike the car.
[/quote]

Does ‘bonnet’ mean ‘hood’? (the body panel in the front between the fenders that covers the engine?)[/quote]

Yeah it does. Sorry if I confused you but I’m used to saying bonnet rather than hood because of my parents.
